body: Success is not for the lazy.
author: Anonymous

body: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

body: Success is the result of preparation
author: hard work

body: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

body: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
author: Helen Keller
but if you do it right

body: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas Edison

body: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

body: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Paul Valery

body: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

body: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
author: Anonymous

body: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote
